entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 50 gusting to 80 in Forillon Park. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 50 gusting to 80 in Forillon Park in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
